name: The Echo Whispers
description: The Echo Whispers is a psychological horror experience that takes you to the shattering of expectations and a surprising outcome. In this game, you are Amy and you are alone with yourself, which is much scarier than being alone without you.

name: Line Link
description: Line Link is a logical puzzle game, perfect for relaxing or while your computer is loading another game.

name: Invisible X
description: We control a taxi driver through New York City's Street in October 1938. We are Paul River who will live an adventure which change our minds. We visit New York places such as 57th West Street with old stetic graphics as tribute for PS1 3d-Games. "The world doesn't know it but we are in danger."

name: DeadBlitz
description: A fast paced first-person action shooter set in a futuristic city overrun by zombies and robots. Feel the flow as you freely grapple and blast your way through a procedurally generated sci-fi city. Get satisfying kill streaks and challenge yourself by besting your best.

name: Cats Hidden in Georgia
description: Find and discover 100 cute cats hidden across Georgia in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: Elis in Winterland
description: In Winterland, everyone is in a winter slumber, but summer has arrived. Can Elis, the only one to wake up, save Winterland?

name: Offroad Survival
description: Survive a journey of a lifetime... if you can! Choose the best roads to reach your destination. Drive across difficult terrain. Obtain essential resources in any way you can. Solve a mystery and avoid a grim fate as you face unexpected challenges that cut you off from the rest of the world.

name: Mini Continental Saga
description: Mini Continental Saga is a biotope strategy history card game letting you freely stir small worlds! Human, elf, slime? Or lead your fishman to create your favorite fictional world! One play takes 5 to 30 minutes. Weave a tale that you've seen somewhere before, but doesn't exist anywhere else!!!!

name: Demon Mage
description: Demon Mage is an action-platformer shooter. Levitate between platforms to strike down enemy Mages with a variety of upgradeable spells. Explore the lairs of each guild with secrets to find in every level.

name: Urbo: Dream One
description: Urbo: Dream One is a meditative puzzle game where you build houses around the mysterious Tower. Let your mind wander through visions of an enchanted city on an island in the middle of the crystal clear waters of a vibrant lake.

name: Hospital
description: This game is an action horror game that can be cleared by collecting cursed boxes in the hospital while escaping from ghosts. Various strange phenomena occur in the hospital. Collect cursed boxes and escape from the ghosts that roam the hospital.

name: Rocketman
description: As Ranger Ross, also known as the Rocketman, you are tasked to reclaim the corporate colonies of Sommerkrit. In this ultimate top-down shooter battle utilize your arsenal of weapons, summon your clucks, and support your allies to break through the enemy lines.

name: Silly Frog
description: Embark on an enchanting journey with Silly Frog. Overcome obstacles in a beautiful swan's introspective realm to win her heart and understand her better.

name: Run For Exodus
description: You find yourself in a zombie apocalypse in our RUN FOR EXODUS game specially designed for VR. Alone, wield weapons with real-life moves and explore a post-apocalyptic world in virtual reality. Get rid of these dead with the quests.

name: Akui: The Insane Cultists
description: A fist person horror adventure in a dark parallel world peppered with monsters and puzzles.

name: Fallen Prince
description: Fallen Prince is an atmospheric combat-focused metroidvania with retro elements. Explore a bleak undead zone, hone your skills and rid the kingdom from your brother's vile sorcery.

name: Twistingo: Turtle Bay - Collector's Edition
description: Play a variety of puzzles and games, including clever blends of hidden objects, bingo, and marble-popping. Are you up to the challenge?

name: The Sacrificial Girl of the Fantasy 3: Kingdoms 2
description: Sin descripción

name: The Hookmarine
description: What would happen if during an expedition the submarine's engines stopped working and you only had your grappling hook to move and do your work?

name: Up to the Unknown
description: Step into a delightful 2D pixel platformer adventure! Explore a mysterious world with a dark world, an invisible cave zone, and so much more. Use simple controls to get past those scary traps. Enjoy charming pixel art and an enchanting soundtrack. Get ready for an unforgettable journey!

name: Emery
description: Emery is a feature rich, fast paced and gameplay focused 2D platformer! Players are able to create their very own Emery class charge bot, and explore mysterious worlds in their search to find and recharge other lost bots!

name: Psychotic Bathtub
description: Psychotic Bathtub deals with Ophelia’s psychotic disorder in her bathtub: Argue with your rubber duck, add bathwater. Your interactions may lead to death, great joy, or worse: Your duck drowns, the bathroom is flooded. Will you find a way out of the really scary parts of your mind? Maybe not.

name: Claws & Chaos
description: Claws & Chaos is an auto-chess-style battler featuring charming creatures in dire circumstances. Build your team and hone your skills while battling across both story and competitive PvP modes. Will you earn your place on the Ark?

name: Artificia Armata
description: A classic tower defense game placed in a dystopic era where humanity is threatened by the machines that they built to protect themselves.

name: NecroAttack!
description: The army of the undead is attacking!!! The fate of the kingdom is at stake! Faced with the tide of undead, the young princess decided to step forward and lead the people to confront the enemy, explore unknown places... perhaps even uncover the mystery behind the disaster?

name: Rich Teddy Adventure
description: Get ready for an epic adventure in a magical world filled with wonder and danger. You play as a Teddy Bear who has been summoned to this realm to save it from an impending doom. To do so, you must travel through a series of portals that lead to different parts of this mystical world.

name: We Escaped a Twisted Game
description: We Escaped a Twisted Game is a two-player online co-op escape room. Trapped in a haunted manor, you’ll rely on teamwork to progress the challenges, face the horrors and ultimately escape together. But can you trust each other?

name: Forest Spirit
description: Tired of office life, you go to live in nature. In this new life, you have to build, craft, farm, fight and interact with the locals.

name: Holua's Arcades
description: Get ready to dive back into the pure joy of gaming. Prepare yourself for four thrilling games inspired by the arcade genre's all-time favorites. From challenging platformers, to epic space battles and classic beat'em up action. It's like having four arcade machines at your fingertips!

name: Quantum Cortex
description: Quantum Cortex is a fast-paced, physics-based metroidvania. Tear through a dark, atmospheric environment at lightning speeds and battle terrifying creatures. Discover the eldritch mystery behind civilization’s fall, and rise up against the transhumanist dystopia that took its place.

name: Antipsychotic
description: This non-linear, immersive docu-music album aims to help destigmatize mental illness by allowing the user to journey through the mind of an individual with bipolar disorder.

name: The Cable Guy
description: Your job is to connect all the users from different projects to their servers in the procedurally generated network. In an ever changing office environment you'll have a lot of nifty tools to help you save your job and keep everyone from losing their cool. Are you up for the challenge?

name: Episode 666
description: Delve into the spine-chilling world of "Spirits Uncovered" where you will accompany the fearless YouTube Ghost Hunting sensation, Scott Warren. Scott is excited that after years of building his YouTube following, he has finally hit Episode 666!

name: Drongo's Festive Adventures
description: Hop the seasons. Collect pickups, conquer themed levels inspired by Christmas, Halloween, Zen Garden, and Easter, and enjoy breathtaking graphics with ray tracing. Unlock each level as you progress, compete on leaderboards, and experience the joy of platforming in this immersive holiday-themed game!

name: Territorial Hissing
description: Territorial Hissing is a 2D sidescroller adventure about bringing down a corrupt corporation in an otherwise bright and colorful land. Something smells fishy. Save your home in this comedy adventure!

name: The Last Exodus
description: Turn-based tactical strategy with massive capital ships, frigates, gunships and fighter squads. Gather resources, research technologies, design and expand your fleet. Destroy your enemies. Single player and multi player mode, hot seat mod also available.

name: Summerhouse
description: A tiny building game about beautiful lived-in houses. No rules or restrictions, just pure creativity.

name: Stay
description: Cas has always hated her job as a motel maid, but when she starts receiving disturbing letters from an obsessive guest, she has never been closer to quitting. Stay is a PS1 style survival horror with an 80's slasher vibe.

name: Fruit Slash
description: In order to bind the maids, the devil scattered their souls and haunted them. Now, they need your help to defeat the demons, reunite the soul fragments, and free them.

name: Succubus RoomMate
description: Enter a fascinating and seductive world with "Succubus RoomMate". In this addictive cookie clicker game, you can buy cute power-up imps and immerse yourself in a story inside the protagonist's room. Unlock scenes with your very own succubus and enjoy intense dialogues in pure anime style.

name: Marionette Eden Breakers
description: Defeat monsters approaching the heriones! 「Marionette Eden Breakers」 features cute heroines in a Hack-and-Slash action game. Defeat lots of monsters and have some lewd "communications" with the heroines...

name: Barbie Superstar! Music Maker
description: Join Barbie and her musical friends on a concert tour through Barbie’s world! At every location, you can express yourself through music by creating amazing music videos while wearing awesome outfits! You can even join the show with your own dancing and singing skills using your device camera and microphone! You’ll be a superstar in no time! Let’s rock!

name: Dead Wells: The Devil Fragment
description: Hack, Slash, Parry and Dodge your foes in this Souls-like Action RPG. Explore the countryside in search of The Devil Fragment while fighting enemies with a multi game inspired combat system where you can launch foes into the air and then juggle them to build your combo meter for multiple buffs.

name: Ice Cold Case
description: An indie detective RPG inspired by titans such as Fallout: New Vegas and Disco Elysium. Talk to the residents, explore the neighbourhood, solve crimes, and dive into the world of the city of Bayview in 3D voxel glory!

name: Gloggy
description: Collect glorbs by clearing ores in the glowfields with your limitless power of deduction - and a bit of help from detectors and extractors. Stay away from the ghosts or risk becoming one yourself. Rise through the ranks of miners to become the true Overglord, and use special traps and skills to win!

name: MTBF
description: MTBF is a VR Multiplayer Parkour Arena Shooter. Hone your skills and master your surroundings to outrun, out-shoot, and outsmart your opponents in fast-paced back-to-back matches alone or with friends. If you can't make it to the top, just try and stay away from the bottom. Good luck.

name: Road to Top G
description: Survive waves of zombies, collect perks, unlock boss door, and face Andrew Tate in an intense showdown. Can you conquer the Top G?

name: Praise Dead
description: Praise Dead is a roguelike auto-battler where you create minions from the parts of dead villagers and monsters. Collect relics that power up your zombies. And defend the town from the nightly demonic incursions that threaten to slay us all.

name: Match Gem 99
description: MatchGem 99 is a unique large-scale 3-match puzzle battle royale game where 99 players compete in real-time. Master the use of special blocks and gauge attacks to outlast your opponents and be the last one standing!

name: Epic Auto Towers
description: Epic Auto Towers is a turn-based strategy game combining elements of autobattler, deckbuilder and roguelike. Purchase uncommon and rare Towers and build the strongest combo to withstand the monster assault! Discover unusual new Tower combinations as you come back for more.

name: The Void
description: Join the quest to overtake the void and become a hero! In this game, you will slay your enemies in a point and click fashion and overtake the void for good, or so you think... Join the quest in taking over the void to find out!

name: Barbie: Dreamtopia - Magical Hair
description:
Join Barbie and her younger sister Chelsea as they welcome you to Endless Hair Kingdom!

With Barbie as your mentor, use your imagination and creativity to design magical hairstyles. Play with whimsical hair accessories to wash, cut, brush, style and color! Rinse and repeat to express yourself and bring inspiration to Wispy Forest and its princesses.

name: Barbie Color Creations
description: Join “Brooklyn” and “Malibu” on a colorful adventure in painting, sketching, designing and more! Explore an ever expanding bedroom of coloring books, tools, designs, locations and items. Bring Barbie’s memories to life with creative design challenges. Embark on a creative journey by customizing items and characters from your favorite Barbie movies and series, then save your designs as stickers and play with them in 2D locations. Earn unique rewards for completing design stories, and use them to decorate your personal studio. Download any drawing as an image to your device, so you can show it off to your friends and family.

name: AtmaSphere 2
description: Embark on a frosty medieval journey! Guide your ball through snowy platforms, conquer obstacles, hidden challenges, and collect pickups. With stunning graphics and immersive gameplay, brace yourself for a chilling adventure! Roll to victory in this winter realm!

name: Humans & Vampires
description: Humans & Vampires is a cooperative tower defense game for 1-8 players set in a dark medieval fantasy age, where an eternal conflict between humans and vampires lives. Manage your base, defend it with towers and upgrade buildings to defeat your enemies and survive.

name: Void Chaser
description: Void Chaser is a 2D arcade game where you're set on an endless run with void spaces to jump over, asteroids to avoid and more!

name: White Magic
description: In White Magic, the player plays as four different characters with the goal of getting out of a maze.

name: UIM
description: A 3D trading and combat game, UIM is reminiscent of Elite, but the action takes place underwater rather than in space.

name: Aconite
description:
Momo is the most positive boy you'll ever meet in this world!

He's a middle-schooler, and his dream is to be friends with everyone in his class (and eventually with the whole school!)

Momo approaches the new days and new people with a smile and endless optimism. But it turns out that it's not enough to make friends with everyone. Especially when your longtime friend has moved to your school and doesn't like your new friends...

Aconite is a game about friendship, sincerity, and trust. It's about how the world is a much more complicated place than you thought.

And how okay it is not to be happy all the time.

name: Portal 64
description: This unofficial, fan-made, demake of Valve's Portal makes it possible to play the classic on original Nintendo 64 hardware!

name: Panda Golf 2
description: Panda Golf 2 is a Flash-based 2D golf game where the player must hit a golf ball towards the flag platform. As the game progresses, it introduces more obstacles such as trampolines, conveyor platforms, flamethrowers, and more. Players could also create their own in-game levels and share them on the Panda Golf website.

name: Hidden Champion
description: Hidden Champion is a turn-based economic strategy and management game. You'll take over the internationalization department of a previously only locally successful company and now you'll have to lead it to global success.

name: Tiny Chaos
description: Fast-paced Action Rogue-like. Fight Hordes of Monsters and Bosses. Survive, Level Up, Upgrade Attributes and Skills.

name: Journey Beyond the Edge of the World
description: An atmospheric first-person adventure game set on a storm-torn fishing ship. Solve puzzles to unfold a mysterious and surreal story – told in a unique way through narrated ambient music. An audiovisual experience with pixelated graphics and immersive spatial audio that works on regular headphones.

name: Killon
description: Killon is a vertical scrolling shooter that features exhilarating combat and a special cannon waiting to be unleashed. Fly a Star ship across a universe in chaos and restore the future today.

name: Cactus
description: Be the cactus, become the legend! Fight to save your planet in this fast-paced single player FPS. Shoot explosive needles from your spiky body to wipe enemy hordes with timed detonations, explore the desert, solve puzzles, find artifacts, unlock special skills and battle against the sun.

name: Chromosome Evil 2
description: Dive deep into this Lovecraft-inspired RTS survival for a second time. Assemble your strike team and manage your convoy. It's up to you to survive the onslaught of nightmares that are surely coming your way. Will you find the source of the darkness?

name: The Legend of Tiny Man
description: A story about a dark fairy tale where you need to save a small kingdom from two evils.

name: Poor Man's Adventure: Narco Sub Simulator
description: Join a small community of rejects, try to survive in hospitable world of peak capitalism. As a modern pirate you will scavenge wrecks of rich peoples' yachts for resources, grow weed and manage automated factories.

name: Cashier Simulator
description: Have you ever wondered what cashier job feels like ! Here is a simulator game for you to experience that, Sit back, relax and watch some in game TV shows while serving those customers.

name: Des Racines et des Graines
description: A garden game where you will explore a calm and peaceful island. You will gather some seeds from the vegetation and re-plant them close to each other to get hybrids. Day after day, you will cross-breed the plants to create some new ones, to finally find and restore the ultimate tree: Yggdrasil.

name: Grey Lines
description: "Grey Lines" is a third person action conspiracy game. Play as Anna, a CIA agent, John, a detective, or Vic, a Navy Seal. Each has a specific set of tools and skills. Engage in stealth ops, investigations, and combat. Your choices shape your story. Navigate the grey lines and the stop global threat.

name: Cosmic Cleaner
description: A stylish sci-fi arcade shooter about cleansing the galaxy of pesky demons! Cosmic Cleaner is a fast-paced, high score chasing action game that progressively gets more challenging. Designed for quick and easy fun.

name: Rome Frontiers
description: A realistic rome builder simulator will allow you build the most important architectural works of ancient Rome. Are you ready to face the challenges as a builder of ancient Rome?

name: Chores of Corruption
description: Chores of Corruption is a top-down arena shooter with roguelike elements where you defeat waves of enemies. Choose between different characters and from a variety of items and traits to create unique builds to survive the ever growing corruption.

name: Azorius
description: Explore the world, get resources, go through dungeons, solve puzzles, fight monsters, use magic, craft items, build a settlement and recruit residents!

name: Balloo's Mall
description: Balloo's Mall - single-player horror game created by indie developer. Complete the puzzles and tasks to find out your friend who worked in the mall.

name: PartySaur: Dino Mayhem
description: PartySaur: Dino Mayhem is a casual 1 - 4 player local multiplayer action game where players battle each other in a variety of mini-games set in a prehistoric environment. Defeat your rivals and become the PartySaur champion.

name: Atrion Project
description: Atrion project is a sci-fi platformer game, in wich you play an hybrid made in a laboratory. Collect the pieces of your crashed ship to reveal your true identity and accomplish your mission. Use your cybernetic weapons to fight unique alien creatures in varied and original environments.

name: Gates of the Mind
description: Gates of the Mind - is a 2D Hardcore platformer. Game should search you in reaction and ingenuity in boss fights and locations.Each Boss fight and Location have a phases where you must be accurate in your actions and contains non-linear solutions for opening gates of mind.

name: Ramas' Call: Twisted Timing
description: Point and Click adventure in a medieval fantasy ambience. Imagine you are a random tabletop geek looking for new adventures and your friend makes a tiiny mistake with his time machine... Now add an adventurer, a noble and a detective and mix them all together in yourself. Must be fun, right?

name: Build a City Block
description: Build a City Block is an addictive blocks game where you need to fill city districts to reveal the landscape. Collect stars to raise unique landmarks. Increase your score and complete each levels.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Tools
description: Puzzles of tools!

name: The Lost Prince
description:
The Lost Prince is a story-based package game developed inspired by the fairy tale 'The Little Prince'. It is a visual novel-based complex genre in which the story begins with the assumption that the prince died from a snakebite.

It's an indie game developed by one person, so it's not enough, but please take care of it.

name: Rune Gate
description: Rune Gate is a deck-building roguelite where you design your own cards by slotting in runes of various elements. Gather your party, craft your runes, gear up and defend against hordes of enemies from the Rune Gate. How long can you survive?

name: Among the Zombies
description: Among the Zombies - you have to play as a survivor in a city filled with zombies.

name: Grim
description: Grim is an Exclusive VR Multiplayer Survival game where you must immerse yourself in its harsh landscapes, where survival is not just a choice but a grueling battle against nature and other desperate players. You must gather resources, craft, and build your base, all to stay alive.

name: The Eastern Drive
description: A fun and casual car driving game featuring Asian cars.

name: Kandyland
description: Kandyland is a single player horror game in which you must outwit beloved characters that once brought you joy, in order to escape the park.

name: Victory at Sea Atlantic
description: "Victory at Sea Atlantic" transports you to the cold, unforgiving waters of the Atlantic Theatre in WWII. With a vast array of ships, planes, and subs, engage in epic sea battles & secure your place in history. Victory At Sea Atlantic is the ultimate naval warfare experience.

name: Collecstar
description: Shoot for the stars! In this cute 2D platform arcade game, jump on clouds and collect as many stars as you can before you run out of lives.

name: Abrupt Valley
description: Welcome to Abrupt Valley, a competitive 1v1 city building/auto battler game. Create your city, upgrade your buildings, prepare you army and watch it fight your enemies. Optimize your city, adapt to your opponent and climb the ladder!

name: League TD
description: "League TD" is a strategy tower defense game that combines unique defense towers and various upgradeable components to unleash different attack effects. Come and build your perfect defense line.

name: Formilion
description: Kill till you get through. Formilion is a top-down arcade blood shooter about a searching a person.

name: Asmodeus
description: Asmodeus is a management adventure game set in a 2.5D side-scrolling world. Collect resources and fight monsters, upgrade your village and defend it against outside threats. Thrive your village with a great commander mind and show your fighting skills during boss fights.

name: Redneck Joe vs The Swamp Zombies
description: In this exciting third-person shooter, play as brave Joe, a typical Redneck who must fight against hordes of zombies and scary monsters.

name: Upon the Eldritch Planet
description: Upon the Eldritch Planet is a sci-fi FPS + Survival-lite + Rougelike. Journey through a unforgiving planet filled with lush environments and dangerous enemies. Equip yourself with a unique RPG build to find your way through each run. Can you survive Upon the Eldritch Planet?

name: The Brittle Epoch
description: An immersive short story walking simulator. About an hour to complete for people who enjoy relaxed exploration while investing in a long term narrative project.

name: Piverantum
description: Piverdex has taken over the country thanks to a virus you created. As a researcher accused of an epidemic, he explores the entire country of Piverantum and creates the vaccine to save the country.

name: Raider: Dark Age
description: Raider: Dark Age is a hardcore PvPvE extraction looter set in a brutal medieval world. Survive horrific beasts and cut-throat bandits while battling to bring home mythical treasure with your friends.

name: Cyber Sprint
description: Cyber Sprint is all about speedrunning mastery. Players must become adept at navigating the digital landscapes with unparalleled agility, employing a combination of sprinting, sliding, jumping, and wall-running to maintain momentum and shave off precious seconds.

name: Nope Nope Nope Nope Nurses
description: The thrilling final installment of Dark One!'s hit visual novel series! Hapless protagonist Yamada is once again at the mercy of the tender depredations of the world's worst staff of nurses... and this time, it's up close and personal with the ruthless Head Nurse who dominates all the rest!

name: Idle Weaponshop
description: In Idle Weaponshop, you are handed your very own weapon shop to manage. Design and sell weapons, build up your local community, hire employees, and send adventurers off into danger for fun and profit... all before prestiging to earn powerful bonuses, all so you can do it all over again.

name: SCP: Contamination
description: A bodycam footage game based on a member of D-class personnel who has awoken during a facility-wide contamination lockdown, you must escape the facility by navigating through the labs, basement areas & SCP classes that now roam free.

name: DefenseCraft
description: DefenseCraft brings revolutionary new mechanics to the tower defense genre, combining the traditional tower defense style with exploration, crafting and more! Sent to a far-off land called Sector 4, in search of a lost group of explorers, we find that the land is not as docile as it seems.

name: Wiki's Wild Ride
description: A birthright denied. An alliance forged. A plan hatched. The Jerks have locked away your dinners deep in the depths of the basement! Now you must ride your trusty steed through the house and reclaim what's rightfully yours!

name: Cyborg3003
description: 6-player co-op survival horror at its finest with cyborgs, monsters, and aliens.

name: Meat and Metal
description: You are the operator of a combat turret defending the border beyond which lies the last human city!

name: Giant Robot Game
description: Play as a giant battle robot that's saving humanity from other giant robots. Fire from cannons, lob grenades, start wildfires, construct turrets, utilize the terrain, hack into enemy robots, make them overheat and explode, equip their legs, rescue humans, run away.

name: Extreme Bus Driver Simulator
description: Are you ready to become an experienced bus driver? Experience the thrill of transporting passengers in a realistic city with Extreme Bus Driver Simulator! Get passengers to their destination on time and safely, earn rewards and customize your bus.

name: Wyred
description: You play as a little robot looking after a lonely outpost on a distant planet. In each puzzle, your goal is to find a way to the other (or one of several) connectors while laying down a wire as you go. But be careful; you cannot cross over the wire you have laid, lest you break it!

name: Paper Planes Plus
description: A Stylish Hyper Frantic fun shmup, arcade experience! Engage enemies in one of 7 Paper styled aircrafts. 4 Chapters to JET through. Dogfight specialized enemy pilots.

name: Plebs
description: Plebs is a casual real time strategy game about controlling ancient Nations to victory through strategic town building, creating mighty and diverse armies, and intelligent resource management.

name: Pim: The Forgotten
description: In this wonderful and colorful world, play as Pim, a fearful red panda able to wield the elements. Solve puzzles, support great heroes and discover the origin of the world in this Action and Adventure 3D game!

name: Ellan: The Lost Soul
description: Ellan is a beautiful first-person adventure game about the journey beyond life, Traveling with a light companion in dream-like worlds, and uncovering the meaning of eternal by overcoming the illusion of choice to light the path to Moksha.

name: Cracked
description: "Cracked" is a wild 2D combat racing game where manic eggs compete for egg supremacy. Choose wacky egg characters, navigate treacherous tracks with saws, spikes, lasers, and lava pits, and race to the sizzling frying pan finish line. Collect hilarious power-ups and pave your way to victory.

name: Black Otaku 2: Taekwondo is in my Blood
description: Join Sahara B. Shabazz as she honours that Korean man's sacrifice by winning this martial arts tournament with the Taekwondo that flows in her veins.

name: Infinite Realms
description: Discover a blend of 4X Strategy, Deckbuilding, and Roguelite! Find cards and customize them with runes, summon creatures, cast spells, terraform the world and push back Morrigan's Corruption!

name: Risky Sanctuary
description: Create, customize, and manage a vibrant sex club filled with adorable anthropomorphic characters. Watch the party unfold, while you install adult devices, navigate finances, protect your reputation, and manage a team of dedicated employees.

name: Uncensor Quest
description: You are assigned to the special cybersquad unit to deal with a mysterious threat which has begun censoring every piece of erotica it finds online. use your strategy to avoid or destroy the enemies and remove the censorship to complete each level.

name: Ardent Passions
description: Ardent Passions is an adult visual novel where Heroman uncovers his girlfriend and her friends' vigilante secrets on a camping trip. With the fate of these relationships at stake, the game unfolds through decisions that determine if these vigilantes become allies or enemies.

name: Fights in Tight Spaces: Weapon of Choice
description: Weapon of Choice is the first major content drop for Fights in Tight Spaces, and gives the player access to a new gun-fu inspired deck with 30+ new cards, new levels, music tracks, and a set of deadly new enemies.

name: Suisenka
description: Main character comes from a powerful family and thus has everything he wants. His colorless life gains new palette after meeting a girl who introduces him to the world of sensual pleasures. But one day mansion inhabitants rebel against such life and try to find their own happiness.

name: Crazy
description: Sin descripción

name: Invention 4
description: Save the world from an impending threat in a dynamic 3D shooter with quest and puzzle elements.

name: Light of Veilendor
description: A story-driven, fantasy game set in a dark and gloomy world filled with danger and opportunity. As the last survivor of the mighty crystal wolves, you must embark on an epic adventure to overthrow an ancient evil and rekindle the light of Veilendor.

name: Call to Arms: Gates of Hell - Liberation
description: “Soldiers, Sailors, and Airmen of the Allied Expeditionary Force: you are about to embark upon the Great Crusade!” This DLC introduces the western front action in 1944, featuring the US faction, as well as German western front content.

name: Legendary Slide
description: In "Legendary Slide" you have to clear away the mahjong tiles by sliding them next to matching ones. Solve unique and mind bending puzzles and collect gems to restore ancient temple of Air. Continue your journey through the Legendary world! This is the Platinum Edition with unique extra content!

name: Star Legacy VR
description: Star Legacy VR is an immersive virtual reality shooting game that incorporates intriguing Roguelike elements into gameplay. Players assume the roles of interstellar guardians who venture across diverse planets and traverse through various time zones.

name: Goblin Survivors
description: Goblin Survivors - casual goblin destruction simulator with roguelike elements. Pump up destructive magic, erase hundreds of vile monsters, survive in battles with bosses! Make up your set of spells before foray into the lands of the enemy, for the most effective extermination!

name: Stellar Initiative
description: Stellar Initiative is a roguelike tower defence game where you land on the planet and use your orbit ship to deliver buildings and support you with fire. Complete missions, install new upgrades, discover powerful artefacts and find the best strategy!

name: Sound Lock
description: "Sound Lock" is a multi-ending puzzle RPG game based on the perspective of a girl without a mouth. The story takes place in a world with hundreds of similar rooms, where the decorations are nostalgic. Explore rooms full of death traps and try to clear the fog to find the buried truth.

name: Vapor Tanks
description: Explore Cyberspace in Vapor Tanks, an arcade 3D shooter with a focus on satisfying gameplay, addictive replayability, and surrealist visuals. It features a 30 level long single player, and Online PVP up to 4 players.

name: Arinn
description: Arinn is a precision platform game with dungeons full of enemies and deadly traps. The only way out is to escape from the enemies and overcome all the challenges. Collect all the treasures and help Arinn pay off his debts.

name: Task Force 9
description: Get ready for Task Force 9 - the VR game that puts your combat skills to the test. Take down enemies using force or stealth while controlling your AI partner. Use cover, explosives, rappelling, wall breaching, and ambushes to survive. Sharpen your situational awareness in close-quarters combat.

name: 2BBee
description: Exciting adventures await you in the world of the most hardworking little creatures! You will have to survive in the world of bees, develop your hive and raise new generations for your life with the dangers that may await you on your way! Survival sandbox, but how long can you survive?

name: V Gate
description: V gate; It is an open world game that includes first and third person shooter, survival, exploration, crafting, horror, thriller, team, building, mystery, management concepts and drags you towards different worlds with explorations.

name: Boyscout: Patrick's Town
description: Boyscout is a top-down adventure in which you play as Patricio, a little boy who is learning to help his neighbors while his father is trying to grow his own business in a rural town. One day, an unusual event will change the lives of the locals forever.

name: Soccer
description: Soccer game that was in some old motorola cellphones

name: Kill The K.O.T.H
description:
The people call and beckon forth a hunter upon their shores to ascend the hill and kill their king who is rotten to his core.

Kill The K.O.T.H is a first-person climbing game by Rubeki.

name: Princess Maker 2 Regeneration
description:
Princess Maker 2 Regeneration, an enhanced port of Princess Maker 2 Refine, will release on Switch, PS5, PS4, and PC on December 2023.

It will have English, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese language support.

name: Isekai: Slow Life
description:
What the-? Been transported to isekai and turned into an adorable walking mushroom?!

In this wonderful new world, you will begin by managing and developing a small town while meeting and engaging with various types of beautiful and bizarre characters. Discover unknown lands with them as you wander at your leisure and enjoy the quiet life.

name: The Blobjob
description: The Blobjob is an educational adventure video game developed by Detonium Interactive and published by Sampo. It tells the story of Joe Ridley, a security officer of the NanoBlob Corporation who needs to prevent an intruder from stealing a piece of technology that will adversely harm the world.

name: Outlander: Fantastic Princess
description:
“A dreamy love adventure that will carry your heart away!”

Outlander: Fantastic Princess is a classic otome game with a touch of romance.

Be prepared to meet all the charming men of the Southern Dynasty and experience a beautiful story of love and affection.

name: Sling Junior
description: Do you love Sling, but find the original kinda hard? Sling Junior is a special new version of Sling for kids of all ages in a nice bite size serving! 10 brand new levels, play as a boy or girl, new aiming mechanism, and a special sneak at some all new grabs like balloon, rocket and bugs from the upcoming Sling Fire.

name: Sling
description: Sling is a 2D physics platformer with a twist. Get ready to fling, flick, snap, bounce, drop and shoot a springy ball of slime through 50 danger filled levels. Along the way you'll meet a crazy old kook - listen to his rantings as they may just provide the help you need to defeat the evil monsters and save the citizens of Oozeville!

name: Archer Pinball
description:
Throw yourself into the spy life with the world's greatest secret agent and his coworkers at the Agency. Fight on top of a moving train, take part in a shootout at the local spa, and evade the yakuza in a frantic car chase. Ride into a zone of... Wait a minute, I swear I had something for this...

The Archer Pinball app features frantic and hilarious action, including authentic voiceovers and sound effects from the TV show, multiple mini-playfields with a unique progression system, unique achievements, and hotseat multiplayer so you can compete with your friends!

name: Balls of Glory Pinball
description:
Your favorite hit TV shows - Family Guy, American Dad!, Bob's Burgers, and Archer - come together in the Balls of Glory pinball pack!

Each official pinball table contains over 15 exciting and hilarious modes based on fan favorite characters and episodes.

name: Game & Watch-e: Helmet
description: A cancelled port of Helmet for the e-Reader. The existence of this port is only attested due to being mentioned on a magazine advert.

name: Game & Watch-e: Flagman
description: A cancelled port of Flagman for the e-Reader. The existence of this port is only attested due to being mentioned on a magazine advert.

name: La Nuit
description: La Nuit is a platformer representing the Art Deco art movement, with elements from Cassandre to Lempicka. Collect the glasses, and wine bottles and avoid the ghost to win!

name: Burasagatte Iru Kiji
description: Burasagatte Iru Kiji is a game where you are a ninja with a hook, do not allow enemies to go unpunished.

name: A Journey Together
description: Sin descripción

name: Pampas & Selene: The Maze of Demons
description: Join Pampas and Selene as they overcome monsters, demons, and the Dark Priest with the help of the gods themselves! Explore this metroidvania 8-bit platformer alone or with a friend. This retro game is a loving tribute to an MSX2 masterpiece from the creator of UnEpic, Ghost 1.0, and UnMetal.

name: A Koopa's Revenge
description: For years the Mario Bros. & company have been stepping on Koopas and Goombas. Now it's time for one koopa to get his revenge. Play through 16 intense levels to achieve your goal of rescuing your Goomba friends and getting revenge on Mario.

name: Star Wars: Rogue Leaders - Rogue Squadron Wii
description: Star Wars: Rogue Leaders - Rogue Squadron Wii is a cancelled compilation game for the Nintendo Wii by Factor 5. The game was set to have Star Wars: Rogue Squadron, Star Wars: Rogue Squadron II - Rogue Leader, and Star Wars: Rogue Squadron III - Rebel Strike. It was cancelled in 2008 after Factor 5 went out of business because of the 2007-2008 financial crisis.

name: Adonis: Escape from Urania
description: 17-map Boom megawad, sequel of Urania. After defeating the tyrant monster from Urania, your spaceship was hit by unknown forces and you had to catapult back to the surface of Urania, in the industrial area, between the jungle and the mountains. Earth coalition ships are under fire and cannot help you. Received information from the command center: this time the threat comes from the moon of Urania - Adonis. The task is to find a way to get to Adonis and destroy the enemies there.

name: Mass Extinction
description: Full 32-map megawad done in the styles I like the most, E1, E2, Alpha and Doom2 Techbase. the mapset is divided into 4 episodes and it covers 4 geological periods of time, from devonian to triassic, and each map represents an age.

name: Alpha Centauri
description: Doom2 episode using doom1 stock textures plus alpha textures. I put more emphasis in lighting this time.

name: Enceladus
description: Doom1 episode which runs on E4 with new textures based on already existing patches and custom monster behaviour via DEHACKED

name: Cyberpunx
description: Doom2 episode with 9 levels with custom monster behaviour via Dehacked.

name: Rupture
description: Ultimate Doom episode with 9 levels which run in episode 4

name: Knee-deep in 2023
description: Classic E1 replacement

name: Eviltech: Soul of Megawad
description: Classic doom megawad with 34 maps. The levels take the names of the buenos aires subway stations and most of them have a color predominancy of the respective station.

name: Locked Arcadia
description: A Caravan shmup made by kollumos, with music by scowsh, for the Gunner Parade game jam 2023.

name: BeZombie Anime Invasion
description: Dare to survive in BeZombie Anime Invasion! Navigate a monstrous city as a transformed heroine, recover lost memories, and unravel your past. Thrilling battles and a compelling story await, all in vibrant anime style. Do you have the courage to face your past and challenge fate? Start journey now!

name: Wolf West
description: Follow Luna's vengeance journey to defeat the sheriff and bring back the forest balance. Accompanied by the Druid, explore and fight the world of the Wild West in the name of your fallen brothers and sisters.

name: Dungeon Survival
description: A side-scrolling, turn-based character development game, where you play as a lord leading your heroes to brave the depths of dungeons.

name: Magical Girl Konoha
description: To aid the King, Priestess Konoha plunges into "Grimoire"! The world inside "Grimoire" is formed by another world called Grimoire Land in which Konoha becomes a magical girl, and has come to save the world!

name: Checkers RPG: Online Battles
description: Experience the ultimate fusion of classic online PvP checkers gameplay and RPG elements in Checkers RPG.

name: Boaty Tanks
description: Embark on an aquatic adventure! Control a small boat, armed with weapons, and navigate arenas. Battle enemy pool floats, test your skills, and immerse yourself in thrilling boat combat. Survive challenging fights and show off your shooting skills!

name: Elon Simulator
description: Elon Simulator is an immersive Trillionaire Simulator with TONS of fun mechanics and activities. As Elon, you can: Smoke Weed (a lot), Print your own Money, Sell Lithium to Earth for billions, make millions while you sleep in real life, Become a Trillionaire, and tons more! Made by one dude.

name: Short Warp: Deep Space Bounty
description: A new take on the classic arcade shoot 'em up, Short Warp: Deep Space Bounty combines top-down and side-scrolling action with gorgeous 3D graphics and modern features. Pick up and play multiple game modes. Choose from stock ship designs, or immerse yourself in component stats and custom builds!

name: Arcana Noir
description: Arcana Noir is an illustrated text-based Rogue-lite RPG using a D100 system, resource management, and decision trees inspired by adventure games and interactive fiction.

name: 52Beatup
description: 52Beatup is a Deck-Building, Fast-Paced (Like Really Fast-Paced), Fighting Game! Enjoy Chaotic and Quick matches with friend or foe!

name: Gas Station Tycoon
description: Build a gas station from zero to become the best gas station business empire in the world!

name: Puppeteer: Control
description: Puppet Master Simulator. Become the Puppet Master and find exhibits for your toy house hells collection.

name: Mushroom Path
description: Let the mushrooms help you on your journey through the different seasons in this difficult 2D precision platformer that full of dangers around you.Still in early development, more content coming soon!

name: Discarded Memories: Mysteries of the Past
description: Andrew Connor always knew that there was more to the story of the death of his fiance. Now, on the accident's 10 year anniversary, he decides that he's going to get the answers he knows are out there, no matter what. Explore the clues to discover the answers that nobody thought would be found.

name: Sky Sojourn
description: Welcome to the world of Sky Sojourn! You are an adventurer who embarks on an amazing journey overcoming obstacles on floating islands. Will you be able to conquer the peaks and reach your goal? Get ready for an unforgettable climb full of amazing discoveries!

name: Beasts & Monsters
description: This game is an extremely addictive pixel art adventure game. No more walking around outside in the cold. Now you can catch all your favourite beasts and monsters without even leaving your livingroom. Stay alive for as long as you can to reach the top of the leaderboard! Collect coins to unlock more wizards, spell books, magical wands and more. Try to always maintain full energy for the special super wizard attack. Fight to free the Pixel Kingdom from the pesky Beasts and Monsters!

name: Eden Isle: Resort Paradise
description: Create your very own resort in this award-winning game with glowing praise from reviewers and players! Attract different guest types, keep your guests happy, manage your resort and work towards a five star rating!

name: Crossing the Sands
description:
A first-person dungeon crawler RPG with turn-based combat and grid-based movement.

Assemble a party of adventurers and explore a medieval desert world, fighting monsters in turn-based combat to build the skills and gather the equipment you'll need in order to vanquish the leader of the raiders. Master powerful healing and offensive magic to aid you on your adventures, and delve deep into ancient ruins to find out who's really pulling the strings.

name: Stunt Wheels
description:
Yes! The Magnificent Stunts are back and this time they're racing around the backlots and studios of Stuntwood.
Battle to destroy your dastardly stunt rivals; Stunt Guy, Stunt Gail, Mucus, Danger-Susan and Nurse Long... and watch out for oil slicks, TNT and squirrels as you race masses of different cars through beached pirate ships, backflip over huge canyons, barrel-roll through rings of fire and smash your way through the competition with the crazy power ups including: - purple-hot Laser Wang, crushing Monsta Mode, tommy-gun wielding Mob Mode and the almost useless Mole Mode!

name: Parking Mania 2
description:
A sequel for a popular Parking Mania in 3D.
Drive and park various cars completing exciting missions.

name: Stunt Car Challenge 3
description:
Stunt Car Challenge has returned in real 3D with easy to learn controls and mechanics.
Perform amazing stunts with a stunt car! Drive on tracks with jumps and obstacles! Race against a train! Beat the cops in San Francisco! Start playing the fun tracks right now, and challenge yourself to get three stars from all levels!
Complete the Arizona levels, and open San Francisco city and port levels! Beware of the trolley cars and cops in San Francisco though.

name: A Murder of Crows
description: Try to get all the crows before disaster comes for you

name: Bahamut2-Come on, Fight
description: Roguelike combat mode, every battle is a new start, choose your favorite transfer route, learn new skills, face different enemies, and challenge the invincible devil. Bahamut 2-Bride of the Dragon parallel time and space, what different stories will there be?

name: Fire Shark
description: Get ready for classic shoot-'em-up action in Toaplan's Fire Shark, now on PC with modern updates. An evil and overwhelmingly powerful military force is about to take over not only a small country, but the whole world... Defeat the enemy and accept your place of honor!

name: Hammerwatch: Anniversary Edition
description: Choose between seven hero classes, each with unique capabilities. Brave hordes of deadly creatures alone, or band together with your noblest of champions in co-op mode available both online and locally. Take on the challenges in three different campaigns, or build your own custom scenario.

name: Forza Horizon 5: Italian Exotics Car Pack
description: Collect 7 Italian new-to-Forza cars: 2023 Lamborghini Huracán Tecnica, 2022 Ferrari 296 GTB, 2020 Ferrari Roma, 2020 Lamborghini Essenza SCV12, 2020 Lamborghini SC20, 2019 Italdesign DaVinci Concept and 2018 Lamborghini #63 Huracán Evo.

name: My Little Career
description: My Little Career is a visual novel for adults only. The story of a young girl who moved from a distant suburb to the big city to become a photo model, but everything is not so easy, the world of big business is much more complicated than she expected, but she will stop at nothing.

name: Yebushou: Defeat Pirates
description: In the 16th century, a large number of Japanese pirates appeared in the coastal areas of China, and a Chinese general was born. He led his troops to victory with very low battle damage, but when he first took office, the army was not capable of fighting, and only you two could save the early war.

name: Glitch Busters: Boss Challenge Pack
description: This new endgame "Challenge Mode" pits you and up to 3 others against six bosses one after another--and of course comes with new customization parts, 15 in total.

name: Pinball Tristan
description: Now you can enjoy the worldwide best selling, award winning Pinball Tristan in retro 3D! You'll love the precise, authentic ball movement and two challenging play modes. Suitable for all ages to play for hours and hours.

name: Newspaper Toss: Paperboy Edition
description:
In Newspaper Toss you need to throw newspapers filled with dynamite into houses and windows to cause explosive fun. Break all the windows and create combos, collect coins or avoid the obstacles. Several game styles to play and over 100 objectives to complete. You can then use your accumulated coins to upgrade your bike or obtain special items to use in the game.

The game features a huge map with additional options to collect even more coins! And lookout for further expansions of the map in future game updates. And for an extra challenge try to collect all stars in every level.

name: Endless Rush
description:
Zoom through the trees as an adorable, furry, six-winged dynamo in ENDLESS RUSH!
Fly through the endless forest of Cerulean collecting nectar and boosts to compete for the fastest Rush in the canopy! Can you collect more, and go farther and faster than your friends!?

name: Moving Out 2: F.A.R.Tastic Four Pack
description: The F.A.R.Tastic Four Pack adds four new movers to the Smooth Moves roster: Chum, Bastian, Hootacris and Cera Topps.

name: Admiral: Battle for Uranium
description:
Prepare your nukes, and obliterate your opponents with an apocalyptic thermonuclear barrage, but get it wrong and their devastating counter attack will bring you to your knees! S.M presents its second title, Admiral, a stunning simulation of global thermonuclear war.

You play the role of a military general hidden deep within an Underwater bunker. Your mission - to successfully exterminate your enemy's civilian population whilst disabling their ability to attack your own. Start by launching your subs and bombers in order to control the last nuclear resources of the world and increase your credits...

Stark and foreboding, it feels like you’re at the centre of the Cold War even before a nuke has been fired.Refreshingly simple yet bursting with depth, Admiral is enjoyable as both a quick blast as well as subtle strategic epic.

name: Raccoon Squad
description:
A game about raccoons.
Sneak into people's houses and steal food, furniture and everything else!
Get away with the goods and fill the raccoon dumpster!
Watch out for the guards trying to catch you!

name: Trainyard Express
description:
What's the difference between Trainyard and Express? In the full game there are more than 100 more puzzles, and you can even make your own puzzles.
The full game also has splitter pieces, which are awesome.

name: Sky Hex
description: Sky Hex is a magnetic logic game that will brighten up your free time!

name: Ocean Scramble: Age of Exploration
description: Nautical simulation game with sail battleship piloted in third-person perspective.

name: Vultures: Scavengers of Death
description: Face zombies and fearsome monsters in this turn-based survival-horror roguelike as you seek the path to recover a valuable artifact. Unravel the history of Salento Valley and its downfall after a bioterrorist attack led by a secret cult involved with the powerful corporation Eugenesys Tech.

name: JetTurbo
description: JetTurbo is a Hoverboard racing game made by fans of the Hoverboard racing genre. Ride, Perform Tricks, and Become the embodiment of Speed for thrill and glory in this Sci-Fi rush!

name: Beneath the Bleeding Moon
description: A boys' love / yaoi visual novel set in 19th century Japan. Follow the adventures of Haru, an aloof young man forced to crossdress by his mother from childhood, and Kishou, a cheerful and irreverent thief brought up in poverty, as they travel across the country to break an age-old curse.

name: Citadale Resurrection: Darkness my Curse
description: DLC Pack for Citadale Resurrection. Darkness my Curse is alat 1980s handheld styled single-screen platformer.

name: Fishing: North Atlantic - A.F. Theriault
description: Expand your fishing fleet with the brand-new official DLC for Fishing: North Atlantic

name: X-Pack
description:
X-Pack is a two-pack of old school games.
This package brings a mix of good gameplay, good music, nostalgia and a lot of Gamer Score

name: Underverse Battles
description: Underverse Battles is a multiplayer turn-based fighting game using the Undertale mechanics. Select your character and fight against other players. Dodge enemy attacks, choose your attacks carefully and win the fight.

name: Dead Spreading
description:
Dead Spreading is an idle game based on the dead,come with us to resist deads!
Search the camp to save survivors,recruit soldiers to resist mad attack of the dead!
Reasonably arrange soldiers to defense and collect supplies,fight and produce at same time to maximize your profit!

name: Embattled
description: Embattled is a fast-paced one-button game. You are constantly moving up and down while enemies on both sides are shooting at you and approaching your position. To change your direction, press a button or hit the top or the bottom of the screen. Hold a button to stay still and put up shields to protect yourself from enemy shots. But when you have the shields up enemies shoot faster and move towards you. Try to avoid enemy shots and make them hit each other to score points. The game is over when an enemy shot hits you.

name: Moving Out + Moving Out 2 Bundle
description: This bundle includes Moving Out and Moving Out 2.

name: Hentai 18+
description: Hentai 18+ - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: DJMax Respect V: Estimate Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: DJMax Respect V: Girls' Frontline Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: World of Outlaws: Dirt Racing 2023 - Ultimate Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Kurayami Zaka no Ie
description:
Afterwar Tokyo. There is a hill called "dark slope". There is an old house where master is missing for 18 years already. Women in the house still know nothing of that mysterious disappearance.
That is the beginning of the story about a serial killer.

name: Furious Bounce
description:
Furious Bounce is a competitive and dynamic online multiplayer hockey game.
Play unique characters, invite your friends and join online games of up to 4 players. Defend your goal while trying to score at your opponents. Improve your Bouncers and reach the top of the leaderboard.

name: Game Cafe Escape
description: Game Cafe Escape is another room escape game from masasgames. This time you have to solve puzzles and escape from a beautifully designed game cafe.

name: Fable Forts!
description: Fable Forts! Defend your fairy kingdom from stupid human invaders!

name: Network Q RAC Rally
description: A rally game for DOS published by Europress as part of the Rally Championship series.

name: Devilish Girl
description: Devilish Girl is a Casual Erotic Puzzle game, you reveal 15 devilish girls in increasingly dificulty puzzles.

name: The Lost Son
description: The Lost Son is an upcoming indie puzzle platformer game. When trapped inside a mysterious world, Sean and Belle embark on a journey to discover the secrets behind the digital dimension and to find their lost son.

name: Carousel
description: Ready to start unlocking your puzzle skills? Come on, challenge and bring the beautiful image back to full display!

name: Football Stars Legend 24
description: Step onto the football field with Football Stars Legend 24, full of exciting football matches, realistic graphics and gripping tactics! Choose your favourite team, feel the fans' enthusiasm and start the match to embrace the victory.

name: Barbie PC Fashion Design & Color
description:
Introducing a whole new world of fun!

Now, you can enhance your child's creative potential with the new Barbie PC Fashion Design & Color! It's an explosion of fashion, color, and fun!

This menu-driven software program lets your child select, then color Barbie fashions. Thousands of combinations to choose from for hours of fun. Available for IBM or IBM-compatible PCs in 3½ inch and 5¼ inch Disk versions.

name: Boffin 2
description: Sequel of Boffin. The gameplay it's the same but with new caverns to explore.

name: Cursor Thief
description: A small Flash game where the player must keep their cursor away from a man who desperately wants it. He'll climb along the border of the game, leap across the screen, shoot rockets and more all in an attempt to steal or destroy the cursor.

name: Pokémon Volt White 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Tibili et L'île de la Panthère
description: French educationnal game for 5-8 years old.

name: Elestrals
description:
A game of monsters, magic, and mythology! You have been chosen as a champion of the Gods, blessed with the ability to bond with the mythical Elestrals.

Together with your companions, learn to cast powerful spells using elemental spirits in your fight for the honor of the Pantheon! As a chosen moral, you'll need to be both courageous and cunning to claim victory and attain immortality.

name: Life Force
description: The Japanese and European versions are nearly identical, but the American version changes the game's plot by adding an opening text that establishes the game to be set inside a giant alien life-form which is infected by a strain of bacteria. Stages that feature starfield backgrounds were changed to the web background from Stage 1 to maintain consistency with the organic setting of the plot. The power-ups are also given different names, with the "Speed-Up" becoming "Hyper Speed", the "Missile" becoming the "Destruct Missile", the "Ripple Laser" becoming the "Pulse Laser" and "Force Field" becoming the "Shield". Narration is added to the beginning of each stage, detailing the area of the alien's body which the player is currently inhabiting such as "Enter stomach muscle zone" or "Bio-mechanical brain attack".

name: Life Force
description: Konami later released an enhanced version of Salamander in Japan in 1987 bearing the American title of Life Force which further fleshes out the organic motif. All of the backgrounds and mechanical enemies are completely redrawn and given organic appearances. The power-up system was also modified, with the Japanese Life Force using the same power-up gauge as the original Gradius. Some music tracks have been completely changed for this release and the power-up gauge is arranged differently for both players.

name: Euotopia
description: A rogue-like MMO.

name: Salamander
description: Salamander was ported to the Family Computer in Japan in 1987. Instead of being a direct port of Salamander, elements were taken from the original Salamander and the Japanese Life Force re-release, and some elements, such as levels and bosses, were removed to make way for new content. Most of the background graphics and enemy sprites from Salamander are used in favor of those used in Life Force, though the Gradius-style power bar is used in place of the original instant pick-up system. The same year, North America received a port as well for the Nintendo Entertainment System. The NES version is practically identical to its Famicom equivalent, other than not having the multiple endings, having two option power ups instead of three, and being titled Life Force.

name: Salamander
description: A version for the PC Engine was released on December 6, 1991. Based on the arcade version of Salamander, changes on this port include starting from a pre-defined checkpoint upon death in 1 Player mode, faster enemy animations, and improved music.

name: Salamander
description: Sin descripción

name: Salamander
description: Sin descripción

name: Salamander
description: In a distant part of the universe, an alien creature called Zelos was born. As he grew so did his appetite, and soon he began devouring galaxies, planets, and stars by the hundreds. Now your planet has appeared in Zelos' path, and it is up to you and a partner to fly into battle to save your world. Salamander is an action-packed shooter where there are six levels which alternate between side and vertical scrolling, each of them ending with a powerful guardian. Throughout the game, destroying certain enemies will release power ups which can be used to equip your ship with more powerful weapons, extra speed, and shields. Gameplay is for one player or two players simultaneously.

name: Salamander
description: Sin descripción

name: PC Engine Game Box
description: An application called PC Engine Game Box was published in the App Store which served as a portal to download classic PC Engine video games

name: The Conductor
description: A short horror game about a train journey and a descent into madness.

name: More Bloons
description: By popular demand, More Bloons is here. Play 50 all-new challenging levels, and a new special balloon type! Some of these levels are very hard, and should keep most of you busy for a while!

name: You're the OS!
description:
Do you sometimes get frustrated at how slow your computer's operating system can be? Now is your chance to prove that you could do a better job!

Behold the nerdiest game ever, in which YOU are the operating system! As such, you have to manage the computer's processes, memory and input/output events, and try not to get rebooted by an impatient user. Good luck!

name: Bloons
description: Bloons for iPhone is here! 150 brand new original levels specially made for iPhone. Now you can play your favourite game any time!

name: Flight Simulator Airplane Game
description: Airplane flight simulator adventure games offer a unique and thrilling gaming experience to fulfill your dreams of becoming a skilled pilot. Plane games pilot simulator 3D has an immersive and realistic Flight Simulator gaming experience. Airplane games provide a realistic plane simulation of flight physics, aircraft models, and environments in flight pilot games. You will experience the ultimate airplane flying fun in this free flight simulator game.

name: Across The Obelisk: Sands of Ulminin
description: In this latest DLC, players will delve into desert canyons, solve the mysteries of the pyramids, and discover what lurks beneath, with two new heroes, a new zone, dungeons, and new events to explore.

name: HoloCure Update 0.5
description:
This update added the Achievement, Stamp, Enchantment and Fandom Systems to the game as well as full mouse support and general changes to most existing aspects of the game.

The new content includes 9 new characters from Hololive Japan's generation 1 and 2, 11 items. 7 collabs, 3 stages, 2 weapons and various new outfits for the 20 characters already in the game.

name: Bot Arena 3
description:
Build a team of bots by following the instructions in the game. Each bot is composed of a chassis, plating, and weapon. After purchasing the items; first mount the plating to the chassis. Second mount the weapon to the plating. You can purchase more than one bot. Once you have built your team, click start battle to choose your tournament.
Better chassis, plating, and weapon upgrades will be available as you advance through the tournament. During battle you can click and drag your bot to the desired location.

name: Amberial
description: Roll and bounce in this mystical cave spanned along 15 levels filled with contraptions that will challenge your gaming-skills !

name: Blosics
description: Blosics is a Flash-based puzzle-physics game where the player must shoot balls at green blocks to knock them off the screen. Doing this will award points and the player must meet a certain point threshold to move onto the next level. It cost points to shoot a ball, and the larger the ball, the more points it'll use up. The player must also refrain from knocking red blocks off the screen, as they subtract points from the score.

name: Holocure: Update 0.6
description:
This update hasn't been fully revealed but is set to add 9 new characters from Hololive Indonesia generation 1, 2 and 3 with related items and stages.

The main new content added in this update is Holo House, a hub area with minigames, stores and a house area to customize. It has cooking, fishing, farming, NPC recruitment based on character mascots and various new challenges that can unlock additional furniture items for the house.

name: Pleasure Zones
description:
Unlock the Secrets of the Pleasure Zones

The hottest girls of Vivid are waiting for your special touch, including the gorgeous Racquel Darrian, Janine, Kelly O'Dell, Ashlyn Gere and more. Caress these luscious stars just right and you'll be up all night!

With the mind-blowing SexPad interface. You have total interactive control - and you can cut to the chase with just the click of a button.

name: Virtual Vixens
description: Save your friend from the evil Crystal who has imprisoned him in a VR pleasure world for his failure to please her. Before you can reach Crystal you must satisfy three beautiful women and solve the mystery of their strange erotic existence.

name: Man Parts
description: 36 sexciting games that challenge you to find, remember and piece together various hunks. Once you win, you won't be puzzles, because whether you're female or all male, after completing each puzzle your personal dancer will dance just for you! If you're in it for the game, the game can be adjusted to varying degrees of difficulty. Man Parts is where your brain meets brawn!

name: Dere Vengeance
description:
Unleash your fears in a fourth-wall-breaking platformer that will leave you questioning allegiances... and reality itself.

Let the hauntingly atmospheric soundtrack and meticulously designed pixel art engulf you in paranormal encounters, impossible glitches, psychological horror, and the nostalgia of classic side-scrolling games.

Enjoy the guidance of A.I.D.E. and a very kind and morally right "Dev," who'll be there to assist players every step of the way. The companions also help give an eerie charm to the surreal experience of playing this unique game. Players also encounter eccentric characters, scary creatures, and unsettling corruptions along their journey.

Experience terror as you navigate nightmarish yet fair platforming challenges with precision and dread. The old-school hard gameplay is reminiscent of classic games that are hard to put down, preparing the brain for the kind of scares that make most analog horror media effective.

Dive into thrilling meta-horror that defies the boundaries of the creepypasta digital horror genre, blending fear and suspense into a truly surreal experience. In DERE Vengeance, the player is part of the story.

Embrace the perfect blend of nightmare and adventure in this story-rich platformer that promises genuine scares and enjoyable gameplay. You can embark on DERE Vengeance without playing our other games, though not advisable, as this terrifying adventure stands on its own with a unique and intriguing experience.

name: KKHTA: Security Watch
description: A KKHTA style I'm on observation duty game.

name: Audio Trip: Swanky Song Pack
description: Take a trip with a modern twist of vintage glamour in our newest DLC: Swanky Song Pack! Enjoy the vibes with 5 sassy songs by Laura Leighe. This pack's choreography is a collaboration with OkDisplay, with a range of difficulties, including Cardio levels by Coopalooper, for a total of 20 NEW TRIPS.

name: WWE 2K23: Bad News U Pack
description: The Bad News U pack includes Wade Barrett & Eve Torres, as well as NXT Superstars Damon Kemp, Andre Chase, & Nathan Frazer. Each playable Superstar comes with their own MyFaction card. The Bad News U Pack is included with the WWE 2K23 Season Pass.

name: Get Them Boats: Orca Revenge
description: You are an orca, a killer whale, out for revenge against the elites mucking up your waters. Attack the rudders, and eat the rich!

name: Floating Cuboid
description: You are an infinitely jumping cube, that doesn't mean that the challenges in front of you become any easier however, sometimes it is hard to stop yourself and sometimes you go too far, but can you make it just like you were before, in one piece?

name: Final Resistance
description: Fortress Besieged is a cartoon style game that combines strategy and leisure. You need to control a castle surrounded by various monsters, collect resources, make equipment, and arm your warriors to defend it to the end in this prison like castle!

name: 911: Prey
description: Search items and solve puzzles to escape from the cannibal's plate. Cover up your tracks so that the maniac does not suspect anything.

name: Across The Obelisk: Sands of Ulminin
description: The Sands of Ulminin await you and your friends now. Delve into the desert canyons, solve the mysteries of the pyramids, and discover what lurks beneath, with two new heroes, a new zone, dungeons, and new events to explore!

name: DCS World: Mi-24P The Border Prequel Campaign by Armen Murazyan
description: In the summer of 2015, the Russian Aerospace Forces achieved significant results in the fight against terrorist groups on the territory of the Syrian Arab Republic (SAR).

name: Just Hit The Button
description: Hit the button to win. The simplest game ever.

name: Imagindar
description: Imagindar is an online PvP Arena game that you can enjoy with your friends for free! There are no predefined classes or heroes. In each match, you create your own class and play exactly how you want with complete freedom. How will you build your dynamic class and outsmart your opponents?

name: To the Grave: The Battle for Faenora
description: Delve into the captivating realm of Faenora in our upcoming real-time strategy RPG game, To the Grave: The Battle for Faenora. Drawing inspiration from timeless classics like Final Fantasy Tactics and Ogre Battle, we're modernizing the elements that made these games unforgettable.

name: Tails Noir Preludes
description: Tails Noir Preludes is a post-noir narrative adventure with branching choices. It is an intertwined series of vignettes about change, circumstance, and consequence. Guide four characters through formative moments in their lives in a dystopian Vancouver inhabited by anthropomorphic animals.

name: Super Gattai
description: Super Gattai is about ensuring that a city remains standing and continues to develop, even when it's constantly being destroyed by monsters that appear every Sunday, using the powerful Mekagears, giant robots made up of various parts that, when combined, create the city's defender!

name: Warlords: Castles
description:
Warlords Castles is a mobile game based on the Warlords series that was being developed by Impossible Games before they shutdown but was finished by members of the development team who continued working on the game for Infinite Interactive.
It launched in an incomplete state with an "as is" build due to the difficulties but continued to be worked on.

It is a lane-based strategy game with 3 resources to manage for that are generated over time and can be sped up by different buildings. Units can be recruited in stacks and march towards the opposing base automatically.
The game has a single player campaign with a unique story and a new arch enemy to defeat. There are 4 playable races and 2 Warlords that could evolve into different subclasses and use spells at later levels.

name: Wipeout Dash
description: Wipeout Dash sees you racing to the finish line to get the best time against a mountain of obstacles that stand in your way. Physics makes Wipeout Dash an easy to learn, hard to master race that will have you replying loads of difficult levels over and over again! You can challenge your own records for each level and see how much better your times can get!

name: Number Jump King
description:
This is a game in which a colored ball jumps to avoid colliding with balls that are multiples of 3.
The jump starts the moment the tap action ends.
I hope you get to the finish line safely.

name: HappyTruck: Fruit Express
description:
HappyTruck - Deliver fruits to the marketplace with your truck.
You will need to get from one place to another without dropping too much from your truck. You will get a precise number of pieces you carry and a precise number of pieces that is required. The more you bring, the more score you get.

name: Driving Speed Pro
description:
Race in high powered V8 muscle cars from classic era to modern day. Highly realistic physics, graphics, sound, car handling and performance set this game apart.
Compete in career mode where you can experience a real racing career. Start off with a small amount of virtual credits and purchase a car to enter into organized series events. Win virtual credits from races that can be used to purchase more cars, pay for repairs and performance upgrades. Build your way up to compete in elite series events.
Modify your car by purchasing upgrades for performance and see exactly how each type of upgrade specifically improves the power and torque of the engine on a dyno chart. Purchase upgraded transmissions for faster gear shifts. Purchase better tyres for increased grip and road handling. Purchase weight reduction for better handling. Purchase suspension setups that lower the car and improve the handling from a lower center of gravity.

name: ThrowBomb
description: Throw Bomb is a basic entertainment of 80's PC. Select angle and force, fire the bomb.

name: Orca: A Lenda dos Mares
description: Orca: A Lenda dos Mares is a role-playing game set in a fictional world, where almost the entire planet is covered in water, except for a few islands, created by Orca, a mystical being with the powers of a magic whale, who can create matter, life and give abilities to other beings at will.

name: Orca 2: O Mistério de Wakkita
description: Orca 2: O Mistério de Wakkita is a sequel to the role-playing game that takes place after the events of the first one, where you now control the guardian of the Wakkita Island, Toots, accompanied by the Red Dragon, Arkos, who is going to investigate a strange sailor who has arrived on the island.

name: Orca 3: A Maldição dos Barbatantes
description: Orca 3: A Maldição dos Barbatantes is the third entry in the role-playing game series. In this new adventure, players will be immersed in a new legend, with new secrets and a completely new world to explore. Sail the Great Sea, meet new inhabitants of this magical world, and maybe even reconnect with old acquaintances.

name: Hearts War
description: Job Change RPG that you can enjoy to your liking! Today, I'm a wizard! Tomorrow, I'll be a thief! MMORPG is also N jobs! We will introduce you to a new world that is different from MMORPG.

name: Pokémon Elite Redux
description: Pokemon Elite Redux has a strong focus on increased difficulty and variety in teambuilding. It features up to 4 abilities at the same time while every single Pokemon & Trainer has been rebalanced manually. There are tons of QoL enhancements and zero grinding. It features over 100 new abilities and some new moves for more variety. It's inspired by hacks like Inclement Emerald, Radical Red, but it's unique in the sense of 4 abilities, tons of QoL mixed with manually-created Trainers.

name: Punisher
description: A rehashed MAP01 - but with more monsters than you can shake a BFG at.

name: Squares
description: Squares is a single-level PWAD for Doom II by Costa Lappas, released in March 1995. It was significant for having a very high monster count at this early stage of the Doom modding scene. Some consider it the first slaughter map.

name: Her Love Just Washed Away
description: Love is so confusing.

name: Junkfood
description: Junk Food is a Boom compatible Speedmapping Community Project held in Meowgi's Community Discord Server. The basic premise was to make "Junk Food" slaughter ala BFG spammy, high monster count maps where not a lot of time is spent deliberating about layout/detailing/fight design/other things that can bog a mapper down. It's just good BFG fun.

name: Chillax
description: Chillax is a megawad compiled by an anonymous author and noted for its extreme difficulty. Most, perhaps all of the maps are plagiarized from other WADs, with monsters liberally added in. The mapset is often played on ZDaemon servers and is meant for cooperative play, though some of its maps have also been speedrunned in single-player mode.

name: Eternal Slumber Party II
description: Eternal Slumber Party II (often shortened to ESP2) is a megawad for Doom II created by TimeOfDeath and released on April 16, 2018. Just like its predecessor, Eternal Slumber Party, it is a collection of maps that TimeOfDeath had previously released as standalone PWADs, or as submissions to larger community projects.
